summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 TOYOTA COROLLA. WHILE AT A COMPLETE STOP, ANOTHER VEHICLE FAILED TO STOP AND CRASHED INTO THE REAR OF THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE. THE CRASH CAUSED THE DRIVER SEAT TO INCLINE BACKWARDS AND THE SEAT BELT FAILED TO RETRACT. THE CONTACT SUSTAINED INJURIES TO THE NECK THAT REQUIRED MEDICAL ATTENTION. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED AN INDEPENDENT BODY SHOP. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 68,609.   MA 10/8    *CN
